name: dat-readdir-stream
description: dat-readdir-stream is a small util to read the file-table of a dat as a stream, rather than through dat.readdir.

scripts.test: npm run test:lint && npm run test:unit
scripts.test:ci: npm run test:lint && npm run test:unit -- --cov --coverage-report=lcov && codeclimate-test-reporter < ./coverage/lcov.info

author: Martin Heidegger <martin.heidegger@gmail.com>
